### Regression Testing

_If your changes affect the core tier list functionality (such as URL encoding, OG image generation, etc.), you must
perform these tests and add more if necessary. Otherwise, you may opt to skip this step._

We haven't implemented automated testing yet, so please manually test by clicking the links for the following scenarios
locally:
